item.title: Report X-2025030623
item.description:
Report X-2025030623

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-22T21:13:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-24
  • City: NORTH HAVEN
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On February 24th during vehicle loading a package was found to have a small tear allowing a small amount of powder substance inside to leak out. The package was marked and labeled as UN2922, Corrosive Liquid, Toxic, 8. No liquid leaked out of the package. the package was contained and the consignee was contacted to retrieve the package.
